result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brady Charles Lorentz

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 19, 2022 at 11:30 am.

1:09 PM  Assistant District Attorney Kaley Walker in Court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Liesl E. Nelson in Court for Brady Charles Lorentz.  Defendant Brady Charles Lorentz in Court.  Includes 21CM239, 22CM27, 22CM28, 22CM201.  ADA Walker and Atty. Nelson advise re: scheduling.  Status with Judge.  Court confirms Defendant's address and phone.  Adjourned at 1:12 PM
Status conference scheduled for December 19, 2022 at 11:30 am.

11:36 AM Brady Charles Lorentz does not appear in Court,  Atty Liesl E. Nelson, ADA Kaley Walker for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 21CM239, 22CM27 and 22CM28 (STC). Atty Nelson notes DE is in treatment and states his mother has revoked contact. ADA Walker is requesting to set another STC out. Court adjourned at 11:39 am.
Status conference scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on October 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on August 16, 2022 at 11:30 am.

08:33 AM Attorney Liesl E. Nelson in court.  Kaley Walker appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 21CM239, 22CM27 and 22CM28. ADA Walker: set out in August. Atty Nelson agrees; believes there is a resolution. Court will set a status w/Court Commissioner. ADA Walker requests stayed warrant be quashed. Court will quash the stayed warrant. 8:56  Status conference scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Status conference on June 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.

08:37 AM Attorney Liesl E. Nelson in court.  Kaley Walker appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 21CM239, 22CM27, and 22CM28. Atty Nelson: unsure if Defendant is getting his mail, does not have his own phone. ADA Walker requests a warrant, but stay for a period of time. Counsel requests another status. Court authorizes warant, stays until next court hearing on June 2, 2022 at 8:30.  Status conference scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on May 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on February 10, 2022 at 11:00 am.
NO ABUSIVE OR VIOLENT CONTACT WHATSOEVER WITH L.J.L.

9:36 AM Defendant Brady Charles Lorentz appears in Court, Atty Liesl E. Nelson,  ADA Joseph Schieffer appears for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CM27 and 22CM28.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. NG. ADA Schieffer is requesting a $5,000.00 SIBS w/conditions of NAC L.J.L., no objection. Court so orders. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 9:38 am.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 10, 2022 at 11:00 am.
